meanings.definition: relating to the making of laws
meanings.sent1: The legislatorial process involves drafting and passing new laws.
meanings.sent2: The committee discussed various legislatorial proposals before voting on them.
meanings.sent3: It was a legislatorial maze trying to navigate through the complex legal language.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to problem-solving was as meticulous as a legislatorial debate.
meanings.sent5: The legislatorial responsibilities weighed heavily on the young politician.

meanings.definition: pertaining to legislators or their work
meanings.sent1: The legislatorial duties of a senator include representing constituents.
meanings.sent2: Legislatorial meetings are essential for lawmakers to collaborate effectively.
meanings.sent3: The legislatorial attire of the congressmen was formal and professional.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her legislatorial tasks was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The legislatorial office was bustling with activity during session.

meanings.sent1: His legislatorial behavior in the chamber was respectful and courteous.
meanings.sent2: Legislatorial speeches often aim to persuade and inform the public.
meanings.sent3: The legislatorial handshake he offered was firm and friendly.
meanings.sent4: Her legislatorial approach to negotiation was diplomatic and strategic.
meanings.sent5: The legislatorial mindset requires a deep understanding of legal matters.
